mapper.select: select a.addr_no as no, a.addr_name as name, a.receiver_name as receiverName, a.receiver_tel as receiverTel, a.addr_basic as addrBasic, a.addr_detail as addrDetail, a.addr_zipcode as zipCode, a.is_default_address as isDefaultAddress, a.addr_created_at as createdAt, a.addr_updated_at as updatedAt, a.user_no as "user.no" from addresses a join users u on a.user_no = u.user_no where a.user_no = #{userNo} and is_default_address = 't'

select a.addr_no as no, a.addr_name as name, a.receiver_name as receiverName, a.receiver_tel as receiverTel, a.addr_basic as addrBasic, a.addr_detail as addrDetail, a.addr_zipcode as zipCode, a.is_default_address as isDefaultAddress, a.addr_created_at as createdAt, a.addr_updated_at as updatedAt, a.user_no as "user.no" from addresses a join users u on a.user_no = u.user_no where a.user_no = #{userNo} order by case when a.is_default_address = 't' then 1 else 0 end desc , a.addr_created_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into addresses (addr_no , addr_name , receiver_name , receiver_tel , addr_basic , addr_detail , addr_zipcode , is_default_address , addr_created_at , addr_updated_at , user_no) values (SEQ_ADDR_NO.NEXTVAL , #{name} , #{receiverName} , #{receiverTel} , #{addrBasic} , #{addrDetail} , #{zipCode} , #{isDefaultAddress} , sysdate , sysdate , #{user.no})
mapper.update: update addresses set is_default_address = 'f' where user_no = #{userNo}
